mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Student (stuId, stuAge, stuBirthday, stuEmail, stuGender, stuName, gmtCreate, gmtModify, isReal) VALUE (#{stuId}, #{stuAge}, #{stuBirthday}, #{stuEmail}, #{stuGender}, #{stuName}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModify}, #{isReal})
mapper.update: UPDATE Student SET stuAge = #{stuAge}, stuBirthday = #{stuBirthday}, stuEmail = #{stuEmail}, stuGender = #{stuGender}, stuName = #{stuName}, gmtCreate = #{gmtCreate}, gmtModify = #{gmtModify}, isReal = #{isReal} WHERE stuId = #{stuId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Student WHERE stuId = #{stuId} AND isReal = 1
SELECT * FROM Student WHERE stuName LIKE '%${value}%' AND isReal = 1
